entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters in the story. He accidentally nudged a goblet with his foot, causing more explosions.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character who tries to calm Ron down and direct their search.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the third main character who gives instructions on what to look for in the vault.

entities.name: goblet
entities.description: A goblet that Ron accidentally nudged with his foot, causing more explosions.

entities.name: ravenclaw's symbol
entities.description: The eagle symbol of Ravenclaw house.

entities.name: badger
entities.description: A badger engraved on the cup that Harry and his friends are searching for.

entities.name: cup
entities.description: The small, gold cup with a badger engraved on it that Harry and his friends are searching for.

relationships.description: Ron accidentally nudged the goblet with his foot, causing more explosions.
Harry is searching for the small, gold cup with a badger engraved on it.
Hermione tries to calm Ron down and direct their search.
Harry is also looking for Ravenclaw's symbol, the eagle.
